
{{alias}}( x0, Ɣ )
    Returns the median of a Cauchy distribution.

    If provided `NaN` as any argument, the function returns `NaN`.

    If provided `Ɣ <= 0`, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x0: number
        Location parameter.

    Ɣ: number
        Scale parameter.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Median.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 10.0, 5.0 )
    10.0
    > v = {{alias}}( 7.0, 0.5 )
    7.0
    > v = {{alias}}( 10.3, -0.5 )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
